Sentencas: Depletion of fossil fuels has increased the pressure on energy systems to operate in the most efficient and economical mode.
Titulo: Degradation based optimization framework for long term applications of energy systems, case study: Solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: This tendency promotes energy systems to operate at optimum operating conditions, which maximizes the system profit over lifetime.
Titulo: Degradation based optimization framework for long term applications of energy systems, case study: Solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Recently, there have been many attempts to maximize lifetime profit.
Titulo: Degradation based optimization framework for long term applications of energy systems, case study: Solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Most of them concentrate on the power generation aspect without incorporating further aspects such as system degradation and profitability through lifetime.
Titulo: Degradation based optimization framework for long term applications of energy systems, case study: Solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: However, the main intention of the system operators is to optimize the profitability of system at the moment of operation and not the total profitability through the system lifetime.
Titulo: Degradation based optimization framework for long term applications of energy systems, case study: Solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: In this study a novel approach is developed which considers degradation mechanisms in optimization procedure.
Titulo: Degradation based optimization framework for long term applications of energy systems, case study: Solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: A DBO (degradation based optimization) framework maximizes system profit through its lifetime.
Titulo: Degradation based optimization framework for long term applications of energy systems, case study: Solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The proposed framework can be applied to energy systems and the optimum operating conditions and replacement intervals can be determined.
Titulo: Degradation based optimization framework for long term applications of energy systems, case study: Solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell is considered as the case study to validate the developed framework.
Titulo: Degradation based optimization framework for long term applications of energy systems, case study: Solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The results show the value and effectiveness of DBO framework to improve the lifetime profit during system operation.
Titulo: Degradation based optimization framework for long term applications of energy systems, case study: Solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Using DBO, the system lifetime profit for proposed case study is increased up to 10.45%.
Titulo: Degradation based optimization framework for long term applications of energy systems, case study: Solid oxide fuel cell stacks
